name: Josey Packard’s Autumnal Old-Fashioned
description: Packard, a bartender at the Boston cocktail bar Drink, offers this applejack-based old-fashioned:
recipeIngredient: Dash of Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-aged bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Build ingredients in old-fashioned glass, add ice, swirl and garnish with orange peel.
